Html: On my mage I tried deleting all instances of the Cowl of Vanity and forcing a Chaotic Skyflare Diamond + Runed Scarlet Ruby in there.  When I look at my Direct Upgrades, it grays the meta gem out.  I don't have any default gems set, I just want to know the dps I'd get out of the Cowl of Vanity with those gems.  Am I doing something wrong, or does it just not work right now?  Using Rawr 2.1.9.

No, that works fine, that's correct and intended. It's grayed out because you don't meet the requirements of that meta. If you want to force it to include it anyway, uncheck the "Enforce Metagem Requirements" checkbox. Though, for accurate calculations, swap other gems around to get the meta requirements. The Optimizer helps with that very nicely.
Ah HAH!  My blue gem was in the head slot which was causing it to lose the Meta requirement, gotcha.  Thanks!
